metadata.titel_preek: Lass mich Dein Esel sein, Christus

primair_narratief_programma.beschrijving: The preacher seeks to redefine the believer's role as a humble yet proud vehicle for Christ's entry into the world, moving from a detached observer to an active participant in the 'Kingdom of God'.

tekstueel_bewijs: die alten Lieder können nur die singen, die die neuen anstimmen
Wer die Tiere von sich abtrennt... hat keinen Teil an der wirklichen Demut

zender.identificatie: The Spirit / The example of Dom Helder Camara
tekstueel_bewijs: da muss man ja tatsächlich den Heiligen Geist im Spiel vermuten
Das hat Dom Helder Camara gesagt

ontvanger.identificatie: The People / The Poor / The World
ontvanger.positie_hoorder: The hearer identifies with the Subject (the donkey) who must perform the task.

tekstueel_bewijs: Eins sein mit allem, was lebt
helper.rol_van_god: God (Christ) is the passenger/burden, not the primary helper of the human subject.
helper.rol_van_geest: External inspiration for the subject's attitude.

tegenstander.identificatie: Human Pride / Intellectualism / Separation from Creation
tekstueel_bewijs: Such nach Trennung von den Mitgeschöpfen
tegenstander.toelichting_ernst: The opponent is primarily an internal attitude of 'superiority' or 'intellectual distance' rather than a cosmic power like Sin or Death.

secundair_narratief_programma.subject: Christ
secundair_narratief_programma.toelichting_verhouding: The sermon makes Christ's movement dependent on the human subject's willingness to be the 'donkey'. The secondary program is subsumed by the primary ethical program.

actantieel_schema_visualisatie.zender_naar_ontvanger: Spirit/Dom Helder → Participation → The Poor/The World

voorbeelden_god_subject: Christus kommt nicht anders als durch solche Esel
voorbeelden_mens_subject: die alten Lieder können nur die singen...
Manchmal möchte ich die Katze des Muhammed sein

voorbeelden: da muss man ja tatsächlich den Heiligen Geist im Spiel vermuten
Manchmal möchte ich die Katze... sein
Bedürfnis, dass man es nur mit großer Anstrengung... los wird
Einstimmen kann nicht durch Wiederholung... geschehen
Christus kommt nicht anders als durch solche Esel wie dich und mich

modale_analyse.modale_interpretatie: The sermon is a recruitment of the will. It focuses on the desire to be humble and the desire to be used by God, rather than the divine power that enables it.

semiotisch_vierkant_analyse.beweging_in_preek: From 'Talking about' (~S1) to 'Being' (S1) via solidarity with animals (~S2).
semiotisch_vierkant_analyse.theologische_resolutie: The tension is resolved through the 'Abrahamic minority' who start the new life here and now.
semiotisch_vierkant_analyse.ernst_van_s2: Moderate. Pride is seen as a social/class issue rather than a radical fall.

diagnostische_evaluatie.classificatie_toelichting: While using the name of Christ, the structural engine is anthropocentric. The efficacy of Christ's coming is made contingent upon the human subject's 'humility' and 'willingness' to be a vehicle.

indicatoren_moralisme.tekstueel_bewijs: Christus kommt nicht anders als durch solche Esel wie dich und mich.

indicatoren_moralisme.indicator: Focus on human attitude as prerequisite
indicatoren_moralisme.tekstueel_bewijs: Lass mich Dein Esel sein... das macht das Predigen so schwierig.

indicatoren_genade.tekstueel_bewijs: da muss man ja tatsächlich den Heiligen Geist im Spiel vermuten!

exemplarisme_check.beschrijving: Dom Helder Camara and the 'friendly beasts' are used as models for the hearer to emulate.
exemplarisme_check.alternatieve_lezing: Christ chooses even the lowliest of creatures to fulfill His sovereign purpose, showing that His Kingdom does not depend on human strength or even human 'humility' but on His choice.

identificatie_patroon.effect_op_hoorder: Pressure to achieve a 'true humility' that is 'proud and self-aware'.
identificatie_patroon.theologische_implicatie: Synergism: God's action is limited by human cooperation.

narratieve_coherentie.coherentie_beschrijving: The narrative is coherent in its call for solidarity, but theologically clashing by making the 'Superstar' Christ dependent on the 'Donkey' preacher.

soteriologie.tekstueel_bewijs: Die Befreiung kommt in den 'abrahamitischen Minoritäten'... denen, die das Neue Leben jetzt und hier schon anfangen.

pneumatologie.competentie_schenking: The Spirit is 'suspected' to be behind the bishop's humility, but not presented as the source of the hearer's power.

hamartologie.ernst_diagnose: Sin is viewed as 'separation from creatures' and 'intellectual distance'.

aanbevelingen.actantiele_audit_samenvatting: The sermon functions as an ethical appeal where the human is the Subject and Christ is the Object/Passenger. It risks making the Gospel a matter of human 'authenticity'.

subject_herpositionering.huidige_probleem: The human 'I' is the subject of the desire to be humble.
subject_herpositionering.voorgestelde_herpositionering: Make Christ the Subject who 'seizes' the donkey.
subject_herpositionering.voorbeeld_revisie: Christus braucht keinen perfekten Reiter; er erwählt sich einen Esel, um seinen Frieden in die Stadt zu tragen.

identificatie_herstel.voorgestelde_identificatie: Hearer as the Receiver of the liberation Christ brings.
identificatie_herstel.strategie: Focus on what Christ does for the donkey (giving it a purpose) rather than what the donkey does for Christ.

modale_balans.voorgestelde_balans: POUVOIR (God's power to use us despite our pride)
modale_balans.concrete_suggestie: Emphasize that Christ's entry is unstoppable, even if we are 'stubborn donkeys'.

tegenstander_intensivering.voorgestelde_intensivering: Address the 'Opponent' as the power of Death/Judgment that only Christ can face.
tegenstander_intensivering.theologische_rationale: Without a heavy opponent, the 'liberation' mentioned feels like social improvement rather than salvation.

narratieve_hierarchie_herstel.probleem: Ethics (being the donkey) precedes Soteriology (Christ's coming).
narratieve_hierarchie_herstel.voorgestelde_structuur: 1. Christ comes to save. 2. Because He has come, we find ourselves in His service.

aanbevelingen.slotopmerking: The imagery is poetic and engaging, but the structural 'engine' needs to be shifted from human effort to divine initiative to truly proclaim Grace.

comparatieve_analyse.verschil_met_retorische_analyse: Rhetorically, the sermon is humble; actantially, it is anthropocentric.
comparatieve_analyse.verschil_met_exegese: Exegesis would focus on the Zechariah prophecy; this analysis focuses on the functional roles assigned to the preacher and hearer.
comparatieve_analyse.unieke_inzichten_greimas: Greimas reveals that 'Christ' is actually a passive object in this text, while the 'Preacher' is the active subject.

appendices.notities: The sermon is a classic example of 'Exemplarism' where a modern saint (Camara) replaces the biblical text's primary agency.
